project1.title: Collectathon
project1.description: Named after the item hunting classics of the N64 era, Collectathon is a video game collection tracker that allows users to search for games to add to their collections. Users can also import their digital Steam libraries.

project2.title: Not Pinterest
project2.description: Modeled after the popular link and image sharing site, Not Pinterest leverages firebase to perform CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functionality on a data set.

project3.title: Solar System
project3.description: This solar system informational dashboard makes use of jQuery which allowed me to easily and efficiently select elements and attach event listeners.

project4.title: FreeLancer
project4.description: FreeLancer is a rennaissance fair planning app. My portion of this group project was to build out the food items page by using firebase to drive the app with data.

project5.title: Nautilus Explorer
project5.description: Part two of a CRUD focused firebase project, Nautilus Explorer saw our group inheriting a codebase and working with a more complex data structure, requiring us to pull multiple axios calls together.
